column4: Does anyone know the default username and password for CUPS web?  It isn't root, I enabled and tried that.
its usually the unix user accounts...root shoulda worked
what does sata have to do w/ ntfs?

it didn't.  Other people reported this problem in support.  I don't think I will loose any functionality.  The most I ever do is delete the last print job if it gets stuck.  I can do that with the gnome tools.
